name: Triangular Bandit
description:
This is an adventure for Moomins & Dragons using the DND 5e system. In this adventure, the party track down a thief that stole furniture from the Observatory.

This adventure is a homebrew addition to Bekah Walker's Moomins & Dragons homebrew and is not meant to be sold, as both Dungeons and Dragons and Moomin are copyright-protected.
